greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative order of 7 mod n, where gcd(n,7) = 1.
comment: Essentially the same as A050979. [_R. J. Mathar_, Oct 13 2008]
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: MultiplicativeOrder[7, #] & /@ Select[ Range@ 100, GCD[7, #] == 1 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 05 2011 *)
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, if (gcd(n,7) == 1, print1(znorder(Mod(7, n)), ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 06 2015
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
